title: The Next House Speaker: the Guy With a David Duke Scandal or a Jan. 6 Ringleader
description: This article is part of The D.C. Brief, TIME’s politics newsletter. Sign up here to get stories like this sent to your inbox. title: What to Know About the Social Security Cost-of-Living Adjustment
description: The 3.2% raise is intended to help meet higher prices for food, fuel, and other goods and services.

title: Trillions of Tons of Antarctic Ice Have Been Lost, Scientists Find
description: Four dozen Antarctic ice shelves have shrunk by at least 30% since 1997 and 28 of those have lost more than half of their ice in that time.

title: Let’s Be Honest About the Hate That Drove the Hamas Attack
description: The Hamas massacre of Israelis was a function of pure hate. We need to fight antisemitism globally.
